title_line<-"| Week| Session | Topic| Required reading| Method| Deliverable | \n"
separation_line<-"| -- | -- | -- | -- | -- | -- | \n"
create_session<- function(vector){
  week<-vector[1]
  session<-vector[2]
  topic<-vector[3]
  reading<-vector[4]
  method<-vector[5]
  deliverable<-vector[6]

  line<-paste0(c("|",week,"|",session,"|",topic,"|",reading,"|",method,"|",deliverable, "|", "\n"))
}
